column5: 200.5 for us.
101 days until we fly in. Packed and ready to go.
113 days until our first trip this year. We'll be at Red Pine Lodge on Abram Lake for the first trip. Sioux Lookout area.
One trip already done Jan 6 to 13. One coming up March 18th. Then, who knows, probably around late May.
We have 140 days until our houseboat trip on Lac Seul. I'll be my first houseboat trip, so another new adventure!
115 days until we leave for Cat Island Lodge on Trout Lake.

97 Days until my Sister & I leave for Antenna Lake with Clarks Outposts. 129 Days until My Sister & I leave for our Trip to North Caribou Lake with our fishing friends from Pittsburgh and 181 Days until My Sister & I leave for our 3rd and Final 2022 trip to Uchi Lake Lodge Getting ready Now and will travel to Minneapolis ,then drive to Antenna Lake staying in Ft Francis before completing our trip to Clarks to fly out Will wait to find out the rules for flying into Canada before we decide to book a flight into Thunder Bay or Winnipeg for last 2 trips. Right now will go with the Minneapolis/Driving option unless the rule of having to have a Covid Test to Re-Enter USA Flying is revoked. Larry Schroeder
166 days until we return to Miniss Lake with Slate Falls Outposts. This will be our third trip to Miniss. Can't wait!

103 before I leave on my first trip for 22 and then again in Late September. Both trips will be back to 5 Lakes Lodge on Gullrock. Made this trip 23+ times with a great group of guys. Looking forward to seeing everyone in June.

Sunday, May 1st, is our planned arrival for our 22nd Season on the South Shore of LOTW(May-Oct). Fingers are crossed with the anticipation that the Canadian Border will remain open! Hopefully the water level will return to a normal pool elevation from its 2'-3' low of 2021. With the success of a new Left Hip Joint, I'm ready for the 2022 season! Set the Hook, CRJohn

we need something other than covid to talk about. No one started a countdown thread yet so.... 108 for us! My wife and I are headed up a week before the group trip this year so she and I can have a week to fish together. We are going to try Crooked pine lake staying at the Arrowhead in Nestor falls. After that we meet the group in Vermilllion bay Friday night for an over night then headed to Cedar Point for our normal week. Pretty excited for this trip as we have fished Rainey Lake the last 2 years and are excited for Canada again. Where ya'll headed this year?

98 for my group, we always stay at Abram Lake Park SL. Would have been 22yrs straight except for the "border issues" the last 2 years. Hope the border crossing requirements get even less by then, 1270 miles is a long way to haul a boat! CANT WAIT!!!!

Your right nitroman. 154 days until we go to whitefish lake. We are getting my son a passport tomorrow. My other fishing partner and I have ours. I know its a long ways off but, its something to look forward to.
111 days 20 hours 17 minutes until we leave! One more ice fishing trip next week and then the long wait begins. I suppose I might need to shop for a jig or two between now and then.
My son got his renewal in the mail this week! Yes looking forward to it!
I have been stocking up as well! Went through all the tackle boxes this week to see what we "need"!
106 until we fly to Hornby with Chimo. Our fearless leader bought a new motor home so we will be traveling in style I think.
Only 35 days until we head up to hunt and fish. Can't wait.

106 days for my crew and I. Headed up to Mylie’s Place with my dad, brother in law and his son. It will be my nephews first time and since my kids aren’t interested in a Canadian trip, I’m excited to experience it with my nephew.Let’s go!
Just over 196 days. Seems like a long time!
